programme.desc: Agent Jack's work partner gets murdered, but when his family get killed, he finds himself consumed with thoughts of revenge, turning his life into a whirlwind of guilt and pain. He eventually comes across Rogue and they face each other in a battle that's one of its kind.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: In Ancient Greece 1200 B.C., a queen succumbs to the lust of Zeus to bear a son promised to overthrow the tyrannical rule of the king and restore peace to a land in hardship. But this prince, Hercules, knows nothing of his real identity or his destiny. He desires only one thing: the love of Hebe, Princess of Crete, who has been promised to his own brother. When Hercules learns of his greater purpose, he must choose: to flee with his true love or to fulfill his destiny and become the true hero of his time. The story behind one of the greatest myths is revealed in this action-packed epic - a tale of love, sacrifice and the strength of the human spirit.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is an undercover assassin who falls in love with Jen and he decides to retire and marry her. After several years, he finds huge reward to kill him, which makes him doubt everyone around him ,so he hides at Jen's father, who was also an assassin and he tries to help him.(n)

programme.title: 13 Assassins
programme.desc: Set in 19th-century Japan; a samurai named Shinzaemon selects 11 assassins and a hunter to ambush and kill Matsudaira Naritsugu, an evil, corrupt lord, who is standing against his own people.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Barney Ross leads a team of skilled mercenaries to assassinate a merciless dictator of a small South American island, only to find themselves caught in a dangerous web of betrayal.(n)

programme.title: American Heist
programme.desc: After taking the fall for a crime that his brother committed with him, Frankie is released after serving his time, only to discover that his brother has gone on the straight and narrow. But the penniless Frankie has only one way of getting his life back: one last job that he drags his brother into.(n)

programme.title: Kill Chain
programme.desc: In a hotel owned by a former mercenary, a number of seemingly unconnected people converge in a series of bloody encounters that can only be stopped by one man.(n)

programme.title: Green Zone
programme.desc: US military officer Roy Miller goes rogue to find weapons of mass destruction in Iraq after discovering false intelligence confirming the absence of nuclear weapons in the region and how the United States was thrown into this long war.(n)

programme.title: Solis
programme.desc: When Troy Holloway is trapped in a drifting escape pod headed to the sun, he realizes that the problem he's in is much bigger than he thought, as the oxygen is rapidly running out, his chances of survival are quickly declining.(n)

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: Rambo, a retired veteran who now catches snakes for local entertainers and chauffeurs locals for a living in Thailand, joins a team heading into war-torn Burma for a rescue mission.(n)

programme.title: Beyond Skyline
programme.desc: A rigorous interrogator embarks on a brutal and unrelenting chase, trying to free his son from his hellish captivity in an alien warship.(n)

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: Former presidential guard Mike Banning must step up when he finds himself in the White House in the midst of a terrorist attack. Only Banning has the inside knowledge national security forces will need to rescue the President from his kidnappers, and avert an even greater disaster.(n)

programme.title: Hard Night Falling
programme.desc: When a gang invades the villa where he and his family are attending a party, an Interpol agent is in for the fight of his life as he has to go against a group of mercenaries to save all the hostages, including his own family.(n)

programme.title: Survivor
programme.desc: A Foreign Service Officer who has recently been employed in the American embassy in London is charged with the mission to stop a terrorist attack targeting spots in New York city. programme.title: The Courier

programme.desc: David Hendrix is an ex S.W.A.T leader who must join forces with Brody Walker, a movie star shadowing him, as the two try to form the surviving members of a training facility into a team to combat a group of ruthless mercenaries that might just wreak havoc in the whole compound.(n)

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: Following the mysterious death of the British Prime Minister, Secret Agent Mike Banning does all he can to stop the planned attack, targeting to assassinate all western world leaders attending the funeral.(n)

programme.title: The Clovehitch Killer
programme.desc: Ten years after a serial killer terrorized a local community, a young boy starts to suspect that his father is the infamous Clovehitch killer after he finds suspicious photos in his possession.(n)
